We arrived at the gas station and to the shower, all the showers were free, we asked for a large shower room, a dark man with orange dyed hair gave us a small dirty shower room, after that we still insisted on a large shower room but in ‚Ä¶

Loud obnoxious music being played in the shower area by the employee cleaning.   Rude and disrespectful employees at counter to check out.  They were more concerned with their telephone call in their ear.  Coffee was full of grounds and ‚Ä¶
Love stop #326 refuses to honor my free shower because the system is ‚Äúdown‚Äù ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ lol. Well, he waited and after he asked someone and the worker announced that she should come back to her store(subway) the guy was upset and as I said she was not happy to be there. The towels in the shower too was needing an updating. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ decent reviews, when is accredited, but today this pilot and management dropped the ball. I'm a truck driver trying to take a shower within our busy schedule.  Well I reserve my shower, and is (ready)!. When I go inside the establishment ‚Ä¶
Clean shower lil small to hold a lot of truck get here early or you are sleeping on the ramp

Not a bad place, was fairly clean inside, and lot was easy to get in and out of. Only reason it's getting 4 stars is because my shower. The handle was busted and was putting out nothing but scolding hot water. Took 30 minutes of finagling ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the door to the multi-stall bathroom closed to respect people's privacy. Additionally he got the line moving by escorting ladies 3 by 3 to the trucker shower bathrooms. I appreciate him recognizing a how he could be a solution and decrease ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Decided to stop in for a shower after fueling (1-21-20) and some employee is playing music on their phone via the stores speakers. The normal music is bad enough but at least it isn't that loud, but this is just annoying as all hell. I ‚Ä¶
SHOWERS! BEWARE!! They do not rinse the cleaning chemicals, smell was strong and ended up irritating my skin horribly, had to leave the shower room before I finished just to breath.

Damaged shower head sprays water backwards,sideways and down. Diesel pump readout was shattered with about half of numbers not laminating.  Must be getting wheel holders with anger problems often. I usually don't see a lot of damage in ‚Ä¶

Poor customer service and management. No towels in the shower. There was expose electrical outlet/wiring shower #3.
Such a shame Pilot. This needs to be fixed.
I don't see myself coming back here unless I had no choice üëé ‚Ä¶
Rather play on their phones then pay attention. I'm sweating and they won't give me a shower because there's no hot water
Clean and courteous staff great shower

showerReviews.reviewText: Lots of room, plenty of parking. Never worried about getting hood ripped off. Get free shower with 75 gallons. Great price on fuel. The shower is nice it feels upscale with  dual shower heads and they had soft clean towels. This is what a ‚Ä¶

Nice place and all, but all the water is tied together, so your shower may or may not be hot, or both. Restrooms seem to be in a constant state of needing cleaned. People are nice, but housekeeping needs more work.
The shower was huge and clean has soap shampoo towels if you need. The staff was friendly the food at the cafe was good. Loved it oh shower only 10$!!
Worst Shower ever! ‚Ä¶
Didn't know how truck stops works and is very nice for truck drivers to have a place to relax, take a shower and grab something to eat and keep working
The register person, Laney, was very kind and keen. Clean shower and plenty of parking spots.

‚Ä¶ with a bar, where you can eat, it also has game hall, cinema room and bawling to keep you entertained. If you need to take a shower after long road, this Truck stop has very clean showers with towels. I enjoy stopping at this Truck stop.

worst TA i‚Äôve ever been to. Only one mechanic on duty that is only qualified to do simple repairs. showers out of order, bathrooms out of order. Place is filthy inside. I reserved a shower on the app and went in and someone was already ‚Ä¶

One of the only things truckers look forward too is a nice hot shower with decent water pressure, my experience at this location was Ice cold shower with low water pressure.

Avoid this truck stop if you are looking for a hot shower.
very clean shower room , pictures, toilet just glistens.  well done.  very nice truck driver
Absolutely freezing cold water in the shower! In February month! Are you crazy? After asking the staff what‚Äôs going on with water they turn it back on.

I come here frequently to shower while I'm living in my car waiting for my apartment to be available. It beat all the gyms around here. Plenty of room, great water pressure and no shortage of hot water. The doors give me a little trouble, ‚Ä¶
